attributes.action: prevent a pyrolysis incinarator being built on our doorstep
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the residents of monklands district, in lanarkshire have the right to live in a town with clean air. we owe it to our children who are our future. we oppose a pyrolysis plant being built on our doorstep. we have the right to breathe, and for our children to be safe from toxic fumes.
